analyzed: rang 'byung gis ni ji skad gsungs de dang // sngon chad bskal brgyar bdag @384b gis gang btsal ba //

analyzed: de ltar bdag gis chos mchog 'khor lo bskor //
translated: Thus I have turned the wheel of the supreme Dharma.🔽Gods, humans, asuras, yakshas, monks,

translated: Lay practitioners, and bodhisattvas,🔽All of you, do not doubt

translated: That you will become sugatas endowed with unequaled power and strength.

original: bdag med gso ba shed bu 'ga' yang med //

original: sems can srog med gang zag med par gsungs //

original: rang bzhin dag cing ngo bo nyid med pas //

translated: Are pure by nature and devoid of essence.

analyzed: dngos med mi g-yo gsog dang ya ma brla //

translated: Free from thoughts and discursive thoughts,

original: rtog 'gyur de yang mkha' la bya rjes bzhin //
analyzed: rtog 'gyur de yang mkha' la bya rjes bzhin //
translated: And those thoughts are like a bird’s track in the sky.

original: gang zhig mnyam med byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing //
analyzed: gang zhig mnyam med byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing //
translated: Whoever wishes to attain unsurpassed enlightenment,

analyzed: thul dka' bdud kyang rab tu gzhom pa dang // stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams su ni //
translated: To conquer the hard-to-conquer demons,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo dam ba skor 'dod pa //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo dam ba skor 'dod pa //
translated: And to turn the wheel of the sublime Dharma🔽In the great trichiliocosm,

original: des ni brtan par byang chub sems bskyed la //
analyzed: des ni brtan par byang chub sems bskyed la //
translated: They should generate the stable bodhicitta,🔽Make offerings to the Tathagatas,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu mchod bgyis dang // des ni myur du yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas //
translated: And they will quickly become a source of qualities,

analyzed: ston pa rgyal ba sdig med lam rtogs 'gyur // skyes bu rtsal 'phags gsung snyan mthar @385a *//
translated: A teacher, a Victorious One, a sinless one, who realizes the path.

original: byon pa // rgyal ba mi mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byon pa // rgyal ba mi mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Victorious One, the supreme human, the foremost,

original: dga' mdzad rab dga'i dngos po stsol mdzad pa //
analyzed: dga' mdzad rab dga'i dngos po stsol mdzad pa //
translated: The one who has perfected the sweet speech of a superior being.

original: thub pa chos dbyig 'byung gnas dbang phyug bstod //
analyzed: thub pa chos dbyig 'byung gnas dbang phyug bstod //
translated: I praise the Sage, the source of the Dharma Jewel, the Lord,🔽The one who bestows the essence of joy and supreme delight.

original: bde ba'i 'byung gnas bde kun rab stsol ba //
analyzed: bde ba'i 'byung gnas bde kun rab stsol ba //
translated: The source of happiness, the bestower of all bliss,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi tsher ma dkrugs //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi tsher ma dkrugs //
translated: The Tathāgata who removes the thorns of Māra,

original: bstod 'os rnams kyis bstod pa gang zag mchog /
analyzed: bstod 'os rnams kyis bstod pa gang zag mchog /
translated: The one who is praised by the praiseworthy,

analyzed: rang 'byung dbang ldan sred bral bstod par bgyi //
translated: The self-arisen one, the powerful one, the one free from craving, I praise.

original: bdag gis phyogs bcu bltas na de dag tu //
analyzed: bdag gis phyogs bcu bltas na de dag tu //
translated: Looking in the ten directions,

original: sdig med sangs rgyas brgya phrag bsam yas mthong //
analyzed: sdig med sangs rgyas brgya phrag bsam yas mthong //
translated: I see countless hundreds of buddhas without fault.

original: sh'akya sengge ji lta de lta bur //
analyzed: sh'akya sengge ji lta de lta bur //
translated: Just like the Lion of the Śākyas,

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag bdag lung ston //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag bdag lung ston //
translated: Those buddhas in the ten directions prophesy for me.

original: rgyal ba thams cad chos nyid sangs rgyas gcig /
analyzed: rgyal ba thams cad chos nyid sangs rgyas gcig /
translated: All victors are one buddha in the nature of phenomena,

original: de bzhin chos kyang de bzhin nyid kyis gcig /
analyzed: de bzhin chos kyang de bzhin nyid kyis gcig /
translated: And likewise, the Dharma is one in suchness.

original: sems can rnams kyang yang dag mthar nges pa //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yang dag mthar nges pa //
translated: Sentient beings are also determined in the ultimate truth.

original: gang la bzod 'di mchis pa rgyal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang la bzod 'di mchis pa rgyal bar 'gyur //
translated: Whoever has this acceptance will become a victor.”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas bar snang de las babs te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas bar snang de las babs te /
translated: Then, after the bodhisattva Candraprabha had spoken those verses, he descended from the sky

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la rab tu gtugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la rab tu gtugs so //
translated: and touched his head to the feet of the Blessed One.

original: des rab tu gtugs ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang snang bar gyur to //
analyzed: des rab tu gtugs ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang snang bar gyur to //
translated: As soon as he had done so, many hundreds of thousands of buddhas appeared to him.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
translated: Those blessed buddhas prophesied that he would attain unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @385b de dag mngon sum du mthong zhing bdag nyid lung bstan pa'ang thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te /
analyzed: des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @385b de dag mngon sum du mthong zhing bdag nyid lung bstan pa'ang thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te /
translated: When he saw those blessed buddhas in person and heard his own prophecy, he was delighted, pleased, and overjoyed.

analyzed: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo //
translated: He was filled with joy and happiness, and he asked the Blessed One for permission to go forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu dbyung bar gsol /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu dbyung bar gsol /
translated: “Blessed One, I ask to go forth in the well-taught Dharma and Vinaya.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

analyzed: khye'u de'i phyir pha ma dag gnang bar byed du chug cig /
translated: “Son, ask your parents for permission.”

analyzed: de nas khye'u de'i pha ma dag gis cho 'phrul chen po de mthong zhing de mngon sum du lung bstan pa'ang thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the parents of the boy, having seen that great miracle and having heard that prophecy in person, said this:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bdag cag gis khye'u 'di rab tu 'byung bar gnang lags so //
analyzed: bdag cag gis khye'u 'di rab tu 'byung bar gnang lags so //
translated: we give permission for this boy to go forth.🔽We too will obtain those dharmas later.”

original: bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag slad kyis thob par bgyi lags so zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de rab tu phyung ngo //
analyzed: bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag slad kyis thob par bgyi lags so zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de rab tu phyung ngo //
translated: The Blessed One gave the going forth to that boy.

original: de nas khye'u de rab tu byung ba dang / srog chags khris kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
analyzed: de nas khye'u de rab tu byung ba dang / srog chags khris kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
translated: Then, when that boy went forth, ten thousand beings also generated the intention to achieve unsurpassed, complete enlightenment.

original: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang / mi khrag khrig phrag bdun chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /

translated: When this Dharma discourse was explained, seven hundred thousand million gods and humans purified the eye of Dharma with regard to phenomena, free from dust and stainless.

original: dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
analyzed: dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
translated: five hundred monks were liberated from the defilements without further grasping.

analyzed: sngon byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i dge slong ma nyis brgya dang / @386a *//
translated: two hundred nuns

analyzed: srog chags nyi khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
translated: and twenty thousand living beings generated the intention to achieve unsurpassable, perfect awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
translated: When the Blessed One had spoken,

translated: the bodhisattva Supreme Moon, the venerable Nanda, those bodhisattvas, those great hearers, the entire retinue, and the world with its gods, humans, demigods,🔽and gandharvas rejoiced in what the Blessed One had said.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: They praised the Blessed One’s words.

translated: This concludes the noble Great Vehicle sūtra “The Prophecy for the Girl Supreme Moon.”

analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
